title: Look No Further! 3 Bed 2 Bath TownHome! Up to 8 Wks Free!! Call Now!!
posting_body: ['EMBRACE THE SPIRIT OF ORIGINALITY AROUND YOU... DAILY!', 'Exhibit is a home of artistry that is conveniently located in a dynamic and welcoming neighborhood— authentic expression abounds all throughout Japantown in Downtown San Jose.', 'Exhibit will feature amazing amenities for residents and the community.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 16', 'OR Text', '16', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1353 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Tile backsplash in kitchen and bath*', '- Euro-style living room and bedroom area built-in cabinets*', '- Smart Wi-Fi thermostat control', '- Gourmet Kitchen', '- Oversized covered decks and patios*', '- Dedicated Work From Home spaces*', '- Abstract wireframe chandelier in townhome living rooms*', '- Euro-style cabinetry', '- Roller shades throughout, including automatic controls for two-story townhomes*', '- Bathrooms with glass shower door enclosures and Delta faucets', '- Skylights in top-floor residences*', '- Berber carpet in bedrooms*', '- Quartz countertop', '- Instant-on AT&T fiber internet with wired and wireless in-home private area network included.', 'Installed and ready on the day of your move-in!', '- Full size In-Unit Washer and Dryer', '- Contemporary LED lighting', '- Spacious 1 to 4-Bedroom Flats and Townhomes', '- Stainless-steel single basin sink', '- Rich wood-style flooring throughout', '* Only available in select homes.', 'Community Amenities', '- Feng shui fire-&-water Skydeck', '- Indoor/outdoor communal spaces', '- Two-story fitness studio featuring cardio, strength, plyometric, and low-impact workout zones', '- Pizza kitchen', '- Indoor/outdoor communal spaces', '- Working nook', '- Interior/exterior custom wall murals', '- Dog run', '- Outdoor fireplace', '- Private phone booths', '- Oversized community club room', '- Home of Empire Seven Studios', '- Bike room with storage and cleaning space', '- Game watching lounge', '- Onsite art gallery', '- Serving kitchen', '- Workshare loft', '- Large custom murals done by Roan Victor, Amy Sol and Andrew Schoultz.', '- Large huddle-room', '- Coffee klatch', '- Six thousand sq.', 'ft. outdoor street art park custom designed in collaboration with local art collective to establish a home for J Town Street Art', 'Pet Policy', 'Exhibit is a pet-friendly community!', '*Breed restrictions do apply.', 'Please contact the leasing office for more details.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Household monthly income will need to amount to at least 3 times the base rent.', '* Prices are subject to change.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Sunday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Exhibit J Town', '525 North 7th Street , San Jose, CA, 95112', 'bVUEKNn6e']
